EmailTemplate.subject: 10 Key factors that will shape the cloud computing landscape in 2018
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
We invite you to check out Forrester’s recently published report, Predictions: 2018 Cloud Computing Accelerates Enterprise Transformation Everywhere <[[https://content.pivotal.io/analyst-reports/predictions-2018-cloud-computing-accelerates-enterprise-transformation-everywhere?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=forrester-tech-q118]]>.
According to Forrester, new solutions and a focus on developers is breathing new life into the cloud. Read the 10 cloud computing predictions for 2018, and get insight into cloud security integrations, who will win the war for container orchestration dominance, what’s in store for megaclouds, and other key cloud foresights.
View the Report <[[https://content.pivotal.io/analyst-reports/predictions-2018-cloud-computing-accelerates-enterprise-transformation-everywhere?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=forrester-tech-q118]]>
Want more? Join us <[[https://content.pivotal.io/webinars/feb-27-digging-into-forrester-s-total-economic-impact-of-cloud-foundry-study-webinar?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=forrester-tech-q118]]> for a webinar on February 27 at 10am PST to discuss The Math Behind (and Beyond) Digital Transformation <[[https://content.pivotal.io/webinars/feb-27-digging-into-forrester-s-total-economic-impact-of-cloud-foundry-study-webinar?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=forrester-tech-q118]]>.
Thank you,
The Pivotal Team
